message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split to start.
Alice, your starting point is reasonable, but let's be a bit more equitable. I propose a 45/55 split.
Bob, time is running out and the pot is shrinking. I'm feeling generous -  62/38, take it or leave it.
Alice, this isn't a game of chicken. We both lose if this goes on much longer. 48/52 is my final offer.
